properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT O.ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , REL_DATE , RECEIPTE_DATE , ADDRESS , PHONE , PAYMENT , DELIVERY , DELIVERY_NUMBER , O.USER_NO , ORDERCHANGE , COUNT(D.BOOK_ID) FROM "ORDER" O JOIN ORDER_DETAIL D ON(O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO) JOIN BOOK B ON(B.BOOK_ID = D.BOOK_ID) WHERE O.USER_NO = ? AND ORDERCHANGE = 0 GROUP BY O.ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , REL_DATE , RECEIPTE_DATE , ADDRESS , PHONE , PAYMENT , DELIVERY , DELIVERY_NUMBER , O.USER_NO , ORDERCHANGE ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
